comments.author: angela
comments.body: thanks for the patch. i will take a look at it as soon as possible.

comments.author: angela
comments.body: applied patch with minor modifications and added tests

comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body:
I think this is very misleading.

A CSRF attack requires the server to accept POST requests with content type form-data.

description: Both the WebDAV and the remoting (DaveX) servlets are susceptible to CSRF attacks.
summary: WebDAV/DaveX Servlets susceptible to CSRF Attacks
